name: Neo Contra
description: It is the year A.D. 4444 and Earth has been transformed into a prison planet filled with criminals and political rebels. A new threat called Neo Contra arises from this underworld society, and Bill Rizer has been awakened from his almost 2,000-year long slumber to destroy this evil menace.
